sentences.sentence: A voice shouted, superfluously: "Open the door!"
Superfluously, he added his silly comments to the discussion.
sentences.translation: 他多此一举地把自己愚蠢的观点加到了讨论之中。

sentences.sentence: In my callback function I also add, somewhat superfluously, id attributes to my elements.
sentences.translation: 在回调函数中我也有些多余地为元素增加了id属性。
